name: The Adventurer - Action platformer
description:
An action platformer game like Super Mario Bros with simple controls. Run, jump, collect stars, solve puzzles and fight your way through an epic adventure.

Omar is a young boy who lives with his father in a small land. Few months ago, Omar saw a strange creature inside the deep forest. Ever since, Omar is afraid to go into the forest and he gets nightmare of that creature everyday. Omar's father wanted him to face his fear. Omar promised to his father that one day he would go into the forest alone.

Help Omar face his fear to go into the forest.

Features:
  • Story driven
  • Smooth and fluid gameplay
  • Epic action
  • Simple controls
  • Exciting and short gameplay (16 Levels : 2 Chapters)
